name: 劉世芸
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出自然正確通順的句子, 且對於基本修辭法能熟悉; 此外, 能認識易犯的錯誤如run-on sentences, misplaced modifiers等. 同時, 幫忙學生練習寫出短文或段落的各種基本文體.
schedule:
1. topic sentence
2. (cont.)
3. choice of words
4. (cont.)
5. examples
6. cause and effects
7. review
8. midterm exam
9. description
10. (cont.)
11. narration
12. (cont.)
13. unity and coherence
14. supporting details
15. process essays
16. comparison/contrast essay
17. review
18. final exam
